1037620.name: Epitasis Original Soundtrack
1037620.description:
The Epitasis Original Soundtrack contains all of the beautiful and ethereal music that brings the world of Epitasis to life. From the secluded islands to the forsaken city, from the red forest to serene grasslands, these tracks aptly mirror the landscapes and emotions of exploring the game's world.

This soundtrack was composed and created by Funk Fiction.

Tracklist:

1. Crystalline
2. Aura
3. Discovery
4. Eos
5. Coalesce
6. Visions
7. Reflection
8. Elysia
9. Forsaken
10. Epitasis
11. Light
12. Ascent

Files are in high quality, 320kbps mp3 format.
1037620.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 简体中文, 繁体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
